show-unit.tooltip: Whether or not show the unit after the temperature value.

show-unit-letter.tooltip: Whether or not show the unit letter (C or F).

show-label-prefix.tooltip: Whether or not to add a label before the temperature value.

label-prefix.tooltip: The label to be shown before the temperature value.

change-color.description: Change color when the temperature becomes High or Critical
change-color.tooltip:
Selecting this option, this applet becomes
 orange when the High Temperature Threshold is reached,
 red when the Critical Temperature Threshold is reached.

only-colors.description: Only use colors to alert me
only-colors.tooltip:
Select this option to not display text alerts in horizontal panels.
(No text alert is ever displayed on vertical panels.)
